Name: A dream that never wakes up
About the game: In the game, the characters controlled by the players have unlimited bullet weapons. You need to defeat the enemy and keep alive! Game function: 1. Shooting adventure games, hot blood shooting games; 2. Always pay attention to the invasion of monsters and smash their plots; 3. A large number of monsters and exciting background music are combined to create a very exciting atmosphere 4. You should calculate the distance between attack and dodge to ensure your safety, otherwise you will be easily killed 5. Join the exciting challenge and experience the joy of winning in the difficult link atmosphere 6. Understand the new combat operation skills, and constantly understand and become familiar with the game mechanism. You need to explore and understand more deeply. In general, as a small game, it looks ugly. In fact, it contains super rich single player game elements, and each game can bring a different and wonderful experience. The music of the game is also very sensual, coupled with the fast-paced fighting in a narrow space, so that you can fly.
